hadiths.text: Narrated AbuBakrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: One of you should not say: I fasted the whole of Ramadan, and I prayed during the night in the whole of Ramadan. I do not know whether he disliked the purification; or he (the narrator) said: He must have slept a little and taken rest

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ يَقُولُ صُمْتُ رَمَضَانَ كُلَّهُ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said: "Indeed I Fasted All Of Ramadan"
